prompt: Subject: Eleven (Chinese woman, early 20s) and The Man (Chinese man, early 20s). Context: Cozy bookstore with soft ambient light. Action: Eleven fumbles with books in panic, eyes wide with alarm; The Man picks up a book and walks obliviously toward the exit. Style: Warm, romantic, cinematic with soft, slightly desaturated look. Camera Angle: Eye level. Composition: Medium shot (Eleven) transitioning to wide shot (The Man at exit). Ambiance: Soft ambient light, slightly desaturated tones, intimate atmosphere tinged with nervousness.
